caption:
Allow Lisa to reintroduce herself. 

America met the 27-year-old as @blackpinkofficial’s unstoppable rapper when the girl group captivated pop music in 2019. But when HBO’s ‘The White Lotus’ returns for its third season this winter, you’ll be introduced to Lalisa Manobal, which is how the K-pop phenom will be credited in her first acting role. 

Manobal had been a big fan of the hit show’s first two seasons but says she felt apprehensive when she got the call to audition. “It was my first time, so I didn’t really know if I would be able to get the role,” Manobal tells VF. Ultimately, she was the perfect fit for a season that would be set in her birth country, Thailand. “I can’t wait for people to see how beautiful Thailand is.” 

For #VFHollywood, the actor and musician discusses feeling “at home” while shooting ‘The White Lotus,’ reflects on her journey as a solo artist, and teases new music. Read the full interview at the link in bio.
